channel.title: Client java downgrade?
channel.description: Okay, well my server client requires users to have jdk and java 6. Is there anyway to make it so it's just they download it and able to play with the version they have? I'm new at coding just started 4 days ago. I am running delta 317 source if anyone can help me it would be appreciated. Thank you.

item.title: Client java downgrade?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

killerkody:

Okay, I made my client and let people download it. Now, people are complaining that it wont start and all there other servers that they play will not load. There telling other people not to play… Can someone please tell me what I need to or can do to fix this?

Show your compile.bat and run.bat

Read full topic

item.title: Client java downgrade?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Dude everyone has java6 at the minimal. Why would you want to go lower.
Oh and the requirement is based off what JDK you use to build it.
